Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, & #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Delaware
ShortDescription: 146, 147 & 151 buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Oak, State, Ohio, Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Oak & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, and #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to large crowds near Michigan/Delaware.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Oak, State, Ohio and resume their normal route on Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Oak and resume their normal route on Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 93rd/Marquette
ShortDescription: EB 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Colfax, 92nd, Anthony & 93rd, due to street blockage near 93rd/Marquette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Colfax, 92nd, Anthony and resume their normal route on 93rd, due to street blockage near 93rd/Marquette.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
